# External Skills

Skills from external repositories, automatically synced.

## Sources

### anthropics

- **Repository**: [anthropics/skills](https://github.com/anthropics/skills)
- **Description**: Official Anthropic skills (PDF, XLSX, PPTX, etc.)

### vercel-labs

- **Repository**: [vercel-labs/agent-skills](https://github.com/vercel-labs/agent-skills)
- **Description**: Vercel Labs skills (React, Next.js, design patterns)

### supabase

- **Repository**: [supabase/agent-skills](https://github.com/supabase/agent-skills)
- **Description**: Supabase skills (Postgres best practices)

## Updating

To sync with the latest versions from upstream:

```bash
npm run sync-external-skills
```

This fetches the latest skills from each source repository and updates the local copies.
